overview.role_description:
1. Cartethyia is an Aero main DPS who scales with HP, focused on Basic Attack DMG and [Aero Erosion] DMG.
2. Cartethyia excels at both direct DMG and DoT, with large AoE and strong adaptability across environments.
3. Cartethyia can apply [Aero Erosion] herself. Some of her skills are treated as [Aero Erosion] DMG, can accelerate or instantly trigger its DMG, spread its stacks, and scale her DMG based on the number of [Aero Erosion] stacks on enemies. She's a core Aero Negative Status DPS.
4. Cartethyia has two forms: Cartethyia and Fleurdelys.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: In Cartethyia form, gather all 3 [Sword Shadows], then use a Plunging Attack to recover them and trigger buffs. Cast Resonance Liberation to transform into Fleurdelys, build up [Conviction], and unleash her enhanced Resonance Liberation.
2. Rotation: Intro Skill (gain Blue Sword) - 4A (gain Green Sword) - E (gain Purple Sword) - Jump + AA-Q-R1-5A*2-EE-R2.
3. Team Comp: As the core DPS in the Aero Negative Status comp, Cartethyia pairs best with Ciaccona for Support and Aero Rover for sustain. Recommended team: Cartethyia + Ciaccona + Aero Rover. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:
Skill Breakdown
1. Forte Circuit
Normal Attack and Resonance Skill are replaced by Fleurdelys-form skills, all of which generate [Conviction], up to 120 points.
2. Resonance Liberation
Switches to Fleurdelys form, consumes HP, and enters [Manifest] state. Fleurdelys's A5, 2nd hit of Mid-air Attack, and E2 instantly trigger [Aero Erosion] 1 time (consumes [Aero Erosion] stacks).
When Fleurdelys is in [Manifest] state and holds different [Sword Shadows], various effects are triggered.
● Purple Sword + [Manifest]: Increases Fleurdelys' resistance to interruption. A4 summons a force field that slows enemies within range.
● Green Sword + [Manifest]: Reduces the interval between [Aero Erosion] trigger and increases [Aero Erosion] DMG.
● Blue Sword + [Manifest]: After using E2 and dealing DMG, Fleurdelys' A5, 2nd hit of Mid-air Attack, and enhanced Heavy Attack will spread the highest Aero Negative Status stack from a target to all enemies within the area.
Fleurdelys generates [Conviction] upon hitting enemies.
At 120 [Conviction], tapping Resonance Liberation casts R2. The casting consumes all [Conviction], removes [Manifest], restores HP, and deals Aero DMG. The DMG scales with the target's Aero Negative Status stacks (up to 5 stacks) and clears the Aero Negative Status stacks afterward.
If under 120 [Conviction], tapping Resonance Liberation will revert back to Cartethyia form and pause the [Manifest] duration timer. While [Manifest] is active, Cartethyia's R1 has no Resonance Cost.
3. Resonance Skill
Deals Aero DMG (counts as Basic Attack DMG), applies 2 stacks of Aero Negative Status, and summons [Sword of Virtue's Shadow] (Purple).
4. Normal Attack
● Basic Attack - Cartethyia: A 4-hit combo (A1–A4). A4 applies 1 stack of Aero Negative Status and summons [Sword of Divinity's Shadow] (Green).
● Heavy Attack - Cartethyia: Consumes STA to attack, counts as Basic Attack DMG, and summons [Sword of Discord's Shadow] (Blue).
● Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia: Consumes STA, executes a Plunging Attack that deals Aero DMG (also treated as [Aero Erosion]). Collects all [Sword Shadows] and grants buffs based on their types.
● Dodge Counter - Cartethyia: Triggers a Basic Attack after a successful dodge.
5. Intro Skill
● Cartethyia: Deals Aero DMG, applies 2 stacks of Aero Negative Status, and summons [Sword of Discord's Shadow] (Blue). This DMG is treated as [Aero Erosion] DMG.
● Fleurdelys: Deals Aero DMG and generates [Conviction].
6. Outro Skill
Increases Aero DMG dealt by allies to enemies affected by [Negative Status].
Team Comp Analysis:
Cartethyia is an Aero character focused on Basic Attack DMG and [Aero Erosion] DMG. She pairs best with teammates that enhance Basic Attack DMG or apply Aero Negative Status consistently.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.
● Cartethyia + Ciaccona + Aero Rover.
Top-tier comp in the current meta. Cartethyia increases resistance to interruption and healing, helping Aero Rover generate more Forte Gauge. Ciaccona applies off-field [Aero Erosion], amplifies [Aero Erosion] DMG and team Aero DMG. Aero Rover increases the max stacks of [Aero Erosion] on enemies. Aero Rover's signature weapon further boosts team Aero DMG.
① Aero Rover EAA*3- Ultimate EE-QR to achieve full Concerto Energy;
② Ciaccona enters with Intro Skill + 2A - Dodge - 4A - E - Enhanced H - R to Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Cartethyia enters with Intro Skill + 4A-E- Jump AA-Q-R1-5A*2-EE-R2.
● Cartethyia + Phoebe + Aero Rover.
Phoebe applies [Spectro Frazzle]. Aero Rover converts it into [Aero Erosion]. Rover also increases the [Aero Erosion] stack cap, boosts team Aero DMG, and provides healing.
① Phoebe starts with held E - QR, without achieving full Concerto Energy;
② Aero Rover EE-EAA*3- Ultimate EE-QR and achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Cartethyia enters with Intro Skill + 4A-E- Jump AA-Q-R1-5A-EE, not achieving full Conviction + R (switch to Cartethyia);
④ Phoebe enters with 3AH*2 to fully charge Concerto Energy and leaves.
⑤ Aero Rover enters with Intro Skill + EE, without achieving full Concerto Energy;
⑥ Switch to Cartethyia + R-EE-R2.
● Cartethyia + Sanhua + Aero Rover.
Best team for beginners. Sanhua enhances Cartethyia's Basic Attack DMG, while Aero Rover increases the max stacks of [Aero Erosion] on enemies, boosts Aero DMG, and heals the team.
① Aero Rover EAA*3- Ultimate EE-QR to achieve full Concerto Energy;
② Sanhua enters with Intro Skill + E-R-H-A to achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Cartethyia enters with Intro Skill + 4A-E- Jump AA-Q-R1-5A*2-EE-R2.

texts.name: Defier's Thorn
texts.effectDescription: Max HP is increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). (15/15/15/15/15)s after casting Intro Skill or Basic Attacks, ignores (8%/10%/12%/14%/16%) of the target's DEF when dealing damage. If the target has at least 1 stack of Aero Erosion, the DMG taken by the target is Amplified by (20%/25%/30%/35%/40%).

texts.name: Red Spring
texts.effectDescription:
Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (14/14/14/14/14)s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) times.

When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain (40%/50%/60%/70%/80%) Basic DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10). This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

texts.name: Unflickering Valor
texts.effectDescription: Increase Crit. Rate by (8%/10%/12%/14%/16%). Casting Resonance Liberation gives (24%/30%/36%/42%/48%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10)s. Dealing Basic Attack DMG gives (24%/30%/36%/42%/48%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (4/4/4/4/4)s.

texts.name: Guardian Sword
texts.effectDescription: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%).

texts.name: Reminiscence: Fleurdelys
texts.skillDescription:
Summon the Windcleaver to attack the target, dealing 27.36% Aero DMG 8 times and 136.80% Aero DMG once.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus. If this Resonator is Rover: Aero or ???, grant another 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Windward Pilgrimage
texts.description: Hitting a target with Aero Erosion increases Crit. Rate by 10% and grants 30% Aero DMG Bonus, lasting for 10s.

texts.name: Windward Pilgrimage
texts.description: Aero DMG + 10%

texts.effectDescription: ATK is increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Inflicting Aero Erosion on the target gives (20%/25%/30%/35%/40%) Aero DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10)s. Hitting targets with Aero Erosion reduces their Aero RES by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) for (20/20/20/20/20)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.description: Inflicting Aero Erosion upon enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.

texts.name: Bloodpact's Pledge
texts.effectDescription: Providing Healing increases Resonance Skill DMG by (10%/14%/18%/22%/26%) for (6/6/6/6/6)s. When Rover: Aero casts Resonance Skill Unbound Flow, Aero DMG dealt by nearby Resonators on the field is Amplified by (10%/14%/18%/22%/26%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s.

texts.name: Gusts of Welkin
texts.description: Inflicting Aero Erosion upon enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.

texts.name: A Heart's Truest Wishes
texts.description: The healing received by all Resonators other than Cartethyia/Fleurdelys in the team is increased by 20% and their resistance to interruption is enhanced. If Rover: Aero is in the team, Rover: Aero additionally restores 25 Windstrings upon casting Omega Storm.

texts.name: Wind's Indelible Imprint
texts.description: Targets with 1 to 3 stacks of 风蚀效应 take 30% more DMG from Cartethyia and Fleurdelys. Targets with more than 3 stacks of 风蚀效应 additionally take 10% more DMG from Cartethyia and Fleurdelys for each stack of 风蚀效应 they have, up to 3 stacks.

texts.name: Wind's Divine Blessing
texts.description: Aero DMG dealt by the active Resonator in the team other than Cartethyia/Fleurdelys to targets with 异常效应Negative Statuses is Amplified by 17.5% for 20s.

texts.name: Sword to Carve My Forms
texts.description:
Basic Attack - Cartethyia

Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

Following Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 4, inflict 1 stack of 风蚀效应 on targets hit and summon 神权剑之影.

Up to 1 神权剑之影 may exist for 20s at the same time.



Heavy Attack - Cartethyia 

Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG and summoning 异权剑之影. Can be performed in mid-air.

Up to 1 异权剑之影 can exist for 20s at the same time. 

This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG.



Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia

Release Normal Attack button while airborne to perform Plunging Attack at the cost of STA, dealing Aero DMG, also considered 风蚀效应 DMG.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after the Plunging Attack to perform Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 2.

Casting Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia recalls all Sword Shadows. Based on the types and number of Sword Shadows recalled, perform different forms of Plunging Attack and obtain the corresponding 人权之心, 神权之意, and 异权之力.



Dodge Counter - Cartethyia

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

texts.name: Sword to Bear Their Names
texts.description:
Cartethyia - Resonance Skill

Attack the target, launch nearby enemies, and then plunge them to the ground, dealing Aero DMG and inflicting 2 stacks of 风蚀效应 on the targets hit. This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG. Can be performed in mid-air.

Following Cartethyia - Resonance Skill, summon 人权剑之影.

Up to 1 人权剑之影 can exist for 20s at the same time.

texts.name: Tempest
texts.description:
Cartethyia unlocks new moves when she transforms into Fleurdelys:



Fleurdelys - Basic Attack 

Basic Attack - Cartethyia is replaced by Basic Attack - Fleurdelys.

Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.



Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys 

Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia is replaced by Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys.

Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks in the air at the cost of STA, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.

While airborne, hold Normal Attack to cast Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 3.

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly afterward to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 3.

While airborne, casting Resonance Skill - Sword to Answer Waves' Call and Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides resets the cycle of Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys.



Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys

Heavy Attack - Cartethyia is replaced by Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys.

Thrust forward to deliver a focused strike, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit. This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG.



Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys

While casting Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack again to cast Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys: fall back and blast the area in a straight line in front, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit. This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG.

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly after casting Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys to cast Upward Cut - Fleurdelys.



Upward Cut - Fleurdelys

While Fleurdelys is on the ground, Jump to cast this skill, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.



Dodge Counter - Fleurdelys 

Dodge Counter - Cartethyia is replaced by Dodge Counter - Fleurdelys.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly afterward to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 4 .



Resonance Skill - Sword to Answer Waves' Call 

Resonance Skill - Cartethyia is replaced by Resonance Skill - Sword to Answer Waves' Call.

Summon a force field near the target's location to continuously pull in nearby targets, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.

Can be cast in mid-air.



Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides

Following Resonance Skill - Sword to Answer Waves' Call, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Skill again to call down a giant Sword Shadow to crush an area around the target, creating a force field to pull in nearby targets, dealing Aero DMG to ground targets, and restoring 决意 on hit.

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly afterward to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 3.

The Resonance Skill enters cooldown if Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides is not cast within a certain period or when switching to another Resonator. 

Can be cast in mid-air.

texts.name: A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers
texts.description:
Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers

By reducing HP to 50% of the Max HP, Cartethyia transforms into Fleurdelys, unlocking new moves and entering the Manifest state for 12s.

Can be performed in mid-air.

Entering Manifest clears all 决意.

As Fleurdelys, Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 5, Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2, and Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides instantly trigger 1 instance of 风蚀效应 DMG and reduce the 风蚀效应 stack on the target hit by 1.

- Ending the state will not clear Resonance Energy.

- No HP cost when HP is below 50%.



Fleurdelys's attacks restore 决意 on hit. When 决意 reaches 120 points, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Liberation to cast Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall.



When 决意 is below 120 points, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Liberation to transform back into Cartethyia. When in Manifest, casting Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers as Cartethyia consumes no Resonance Energy.



When Fleurdelys has 人权之心 in Manifest:

- Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 4 will generate a force field to Stagnate the targets within the range.

- Fleurdelys's resistance to interruption increases. 

人权之心 is removed when Manifest ends.



When Fleurdelys has 神权之意 in Manifest: 

风蚀效应 DMG is Amplified by 50% and the damage interval is decreased by 50% for enemies within a certain distance from Fleurdelys.

神权之意 is removed when Manifest ends.



When Fleurdelys has 异权之力 in Manifest:

When casting Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 5, Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2 and Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys or after Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides deals damage, raise the 风蚀效应 stacks on all nearby targets to the highest count among the targets.

异权之力 is removed when Manifest ends.



Fleurdelys will transform back to Cartethyia during quest dialogues, environmental interaction animations, or using Utilities.

Fleurdelys can walk on water. Doing so on deep waters continuously consumes STA. When in walking state, Fleurdelys can step out of a high place and walk in mid-air by continuously consuming STA.



Avatar - Cartethyia

As Fleurdelys, when 决意 is below 120 points, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Liberation to perform Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 2 and temporarily transform back to Cartethyia, which pauses the timer on Manifest.

Can be cast in mid-air. Casting the skill in mid-air performs Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia.



Avatar - Fleurdelys

When in Manifest, casting Resonance Liberation as Cartethyia performs Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2 without consuming Resonance Energy and transforms her back to Fleurdelys, which resumes the timer on Manifest.

Can be cast in mid-air. Casting this skill in mid-air performs Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 1.



Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall

When Fleurdelys has 120 points of 决意, Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers is replaced by Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall.

Casting Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall removes all 决意, ends Manifest, restores 50% of Max HP, and then deals Aero DMG to all targets in an area along a straight line in front. Upon hitting the target, remove all stacks of 风蚀效应 on the target. Each stack removed Amplifies the DMG taken by the targets by 20%, up to 5 stacks.

Can be cast in mid-air.

texts.name: Sword to Mark Tide's Trace
texts.description:
Cartethyia - Sword to Mark Tide's Trace

Deal Aero DMG and inflict 2 stacks of 风蚀效应 on targets hit. Summon 异权剑之影.

Up to 1 异权剑之影 may exist at the same time, lasting 20s.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after Cartethyia - Sword to Mark Tide's Trace to perform Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 2.



Fleurdelys - Sword to Call for Freedom

Thrust forward to impale the target, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after Fleurdelys - Sword to Call for Freedom to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2.

texts.description:

This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG.

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly after casting Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys to cast Upward Cut - Fleurdelys.



Upward Cut - Fleurdelys

While Fleurdelys is on the ground, Jump to cast this skill, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.



Dodge Counter - Fleurdelys 

Dodge Counter - Cartethyia is replaced by Dodge Counter - Fleurdelys.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意 on hit.

Resonance Skill - Cartethyia is replaced by Resonance Skill - Sword to Answer Waves' Call.

Can be cast in mid-air.



Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides

Follow up with Basic Attack shortly afterward to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 3.

texts.name: Sword to Bear Their Names
texts.description:
Cartethyia - Resonance Skill

Attack the target, launch nearby enemies, and then plunge them to the ground, dealing Aero DMG and inflicting 2 stacks of 风蚀效应 on the targets hit. This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG. Can be performed in mid-air.

Following Cartethyia - Resonance Skill, summon 人权剑之影.

Up to 1 人权剑之影 can exist for 20s at the same time.

texts.name: Sword to Carve My Forms
texts.description:
Basic Attack - Cartethyia

Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

Following Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 4, inflict 1 stack of 风蚀效应 on targets hit and summon 神权剑之影.

Up to 1 神权剑之影 may exist for 20s at the same time.



Heavy Attack - Cartethyia 

Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG and summoning 异权剑之影. Can be performed in mid-air.

Up to 1 异权剑之影 can exist for 20s at the same time. 

This instance of DMG is considered Basic Attack DMG.



Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia

Release Normal Attack button while airborne to perform Plunging Attack at the cost of STA, dealing Aero DMG, also considered 风蚀效应 DMG.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after the Plunging Attack to perform Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 2.

Casting Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia recalls all Sword Shadows. Based on the types and number of Sword Shadows recalled, perform different forms of Plunging Attack and obtain the corresponding 人权之心, 神权之意, and 异权之力.



Dodge Counter - Cartethyia

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

texts.name: Sword to Mark Tide's Trace
texts.description:
Cartethyia - Sword to Mark Tide's Trace

Deal Aero DMG and inflict 2 stacks of 风蚀效应 on targets hit. Summon 异权剑之影.

Up to 1 异权剑之影 may exist at the same time, lasting 20s.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after Cartethyia - Sword to Mark Tide's Trace to perform Basic Attack - Cartethyia Stage 2.



Fleurdelys - Sword to Call for Freedom

Thrust forward to impale the target, dealing Aero DMG and restoring 决意.

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after Fleurdelys - Sword to Call for Freedom to cast Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2.

texts.name: Crown Destined by Fate
texts.description:
Gain Zeal that lasts for 10s when Cartethyia's or Fleurdelys's attacks directly damage and defeat targets inflicted with Aero Erosion.

In the Zeal state, upon defeating enemies, the next move that directly damages targets raises the Aero Erosion stacks on the targets to the highest count among the targets defeated. This will not exceed the current max Aero Erosion stack limit. Zeal is removed afterward and enters a 1s cooldown.

When Fleurdelys's Conviction hits 30/60/90/120, Fleurdelys's Crit. DMG is increased by 25% for 15s, up to 4 stacks. The duration of this effect does not reset upon gaining new stacks. After casting Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall, the increased Crit. DMG is removed.

texts.name: Blade Broken by Tempest
texts.description:
Casting Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers increases the max stack limit of Aero Erosion on targets within a certain range by 3 . The next attack that directly damages the target inflicts 3 of Aero Erosion on all targets within a certain range and immediately triggers the Aero Erosion DMG on the targets hit once without consuming the Aero Erosion stacks.

The DMG Multipliers of Cartethyia's Basic Attack, Heavy Attack, Dodge Counter, and Intro Skill are increased by 50% and the DMG Multiplier of her Mid-air Attack is increased by 200%.

After casting Mid-air Attack - Cartethyia, every 1 type of Sword Shadow recalled reduces the cooldown of Resonance Skill - Cartethyia by 1s.

texts.name: Prisoner Hanged in the Tower
texts.description:
Basic Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 5, Mid-air Attack - Fleurdelys Stage 2, Enhanced Heavy Attack - Fleurdelys, and Resonance Skill - May Tempest Break the Tides now inflict 2 of Aero Erosion on the targets hit.

The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill - Blade of Howling Squall is increased by 100%.

texts.name: Sacrifice Made for Salvation
texts.description: After Resonators in the team inflict Havoc Bane, Fusion Burst, Spectro Frazzle , Electro Flare, Glacio Chafe, orAero Erosion, all Resonators in the team gain 20% DMG Bonus for all Attributes for 20s.

texts.name: Hope Reshaped in Storms
texts.description:
When Cartethyia or Fleurdelys takes a fatal blow, they will not be downed by this instance of damage, but instead gain a Shield equal to 20% of Cartethyia's Max HP for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 10 min.

The HP cost for casting Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers is reduced to 25% of Max HP.

texts.name: Freedom Found in Storm's Wake
texts.description:
After casting Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall, raise the Aero Erosion stacks on the target hit to max. Casting Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall no longer removes the Aero Erosion stacks on the target.

Within 30s after casting Intro Skill - Sword to Mark Tide's Trace, Intro Skill - Sword to Call for Freedom, Resonance Liberation - A Knight's Heartfelt Prayers, and Resonance Liberation - Blade of Howling Squall, when any Resonator in the team inflicts Aero Erosion on the targets with max stacks of Aero Erosion, immediately trigger the Aero Erosion DMG once.

The targets take 40% more DMG from Fleurdelys.
